languages.text: As long as the Sire is alive, all of his allies have the {g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}frenzied devotion{/g} effect.
languages.original_text:
While Patriarch is alive, all his allies get Devastating Wounds buff:
Critical chance is increased by 2*(AGI Bonus)%. When target is hit by critical strike this attack applies FrightenedBuff for 3 rounds (target's MP are halved, WP, WS and BS are decreased by 15)

languages.text: Mientras el progenitor viva, todos sus aliados se benefician del efecto {g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}Devoción frenética{/g}.
languages.original_text: As long as the Sire is alive, all of his allies have the {g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}frenzied devotion{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: Mientras el progenitor viva, todos sus aliados se benefician del efecto {g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}Devoción frenética{/g}.

languages.text: サイアが生きている限り、サイアの味方はすべて{g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}熱狂的な献身{/g}効果を持つ。
languages.original_text: As long as the Sire is alive, all of his allies have the {g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}frenzied devotion{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: サイアが生きている限り、サイアの味方はすべて{g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}熱狂的な献身{/g}効果を持つ。

languages.text: 只要虫群族长还活着，他的所有盟友都会拥有{g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}狂热忠诚{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: As long as the Sire is alive, all of his allies have the {g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}frenzied devotion{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: 只要虫群族长还活着，他的所有盟友都会拥有{g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}狂热忠诚{/g}效果。

languages.text: Solange der Schöpfer lebt, haben alle seine Verbündeten den Effekt {g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}Ekstatische Verehrung{/g}.
languages.original_text: As long as the Sire is alive, all of his allies have the {g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}frenzied devotion{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: Solange der Schöpfer lebt, haben alle seine Verbündeten den Effekt {g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}Ekstatische Verehrung{/g}.

languages.text: Tant que le Sire est en vie, tous ses alliés bénéficient de l'effet {g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}Frénésie{/g}.
languages.original_text: As long as the Sire is alive, all of his allies have the {g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}frenzied devotion{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: Tant que le Sire est en vie, tous ses alliés bénéficient de l'effet {g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}Frénésie{/g}.

languages.text: Пока Предок жив, на всех его союзников действует эффект {g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}бешеный пыл{/g}.
languages.original_text: As long as the Sire is alive, all of his allies have the {g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}frenzied devotion{/g} effect.

Пока Предок жив, на всех его союзников действует эффект {g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}бешеный пыл{/g}.

languages.text: Efendi, sağ olduğu sürece tüm dost birimleri {g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}çılgınca bağlılık{/g} etkisine sahip olur.
languages.original_text: As long as the Sire is alive, all of his allies have the {g|f:8b792feec7fb4f86a42ef59ff1e9920d}frenzied devotion{/g} effect.
